sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-dialog v-model="tierDialog">
    <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
      <v-btn color="primary" v-on="on">
        <v-icon>
          mdi-magnify
        </v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </template>
    <v-form @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
      <v-container >
        <v-row
          dense>
          <v-col>
            <v-card>
              <v-card-title>
                Lower Threshold
              </v-card-title>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col>
            <v-card>
              <v-card-title>
                Upper Threshold
              </v-card-title>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col>
            <v-card>
              <v-card-title>
                Percentage Fee
              </v-card-title>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <template
          v-if="tierThresholds.length && tierPercs.length">
          <v-row
            v-for="(threshold, i) in tierThresholds"
            :key="threshold.id"

            dense>
            <v-col :cols="4">
              <v-currency-field
                dense solo hide-details
                :value = "threshold.lower_threshold"
                @input = "setLowerThreshold($event, i)"
                prefix="$"
                />
            </v-col>
            <v-col  :cols="4">
              <v-currency-field
                dense solo hide-details
                :value = "threshold.threshold"
                @input = "setThreshold($event, i)"
                prefix="$"
                />
            </v-col>
            <v-col  :cols="4">
              <v-text-field
                dense solo hide-details
                :value = "getPercentage(i)"
                @input = "setPercentage($event, i)"
                suffix="%"
                />
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </template>
        <v-row
          dense>
          <v-col :cols="4">
            <v-currency-field
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model = "newThreshold.lower_threshold"
              prefix="$"

              />
          </v-col>
          <v-col  :cols="4">
            <v-currency-field
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model = "newThreshold.threshold"
              prefix="$"
            />
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            :cols="3">
            <v-text-field
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model = "newPercentage.percentage"
              suffix="%"
            />
          </v-col>
          <v-col  :cols="1">
            <v-btn
              color="primary"
              @click="addNewTier">
              <v-icon>
                mdi-plus
              </v-icon>
            </v-btn>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">
          Save
        </v-btn>
      </v-container>
      </v-form>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";

export default {
  name: "ModifyTierFees",
  inject: {
    platformId: { default: null },
    scenarioId: { default: null },
  },
  props: {
    platformFee: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
    platform: {
      type: Number,
      required: false,
    }
  },
  components: {
  },
  data() {
    return {
      error: null,
      tierDialog: false,
      tierThresholds: [],
      tierPercs: [],
      newThreshold: {
        lower_threshold: 0,
        threshold: 0,
        platform_fee_group: null
      },
      newPercentage: {
        percentage: 0,
        platform_fee_group: null
      },
    };
  },
  computed: {
    selectPlatformID: function() {
      if (this.platform == null) {
        return this.platformId;
      } else {
        return this.platform;
      }
    },
  },
  methods: {
    getTierThresholds() {
      let endpoint = null
      if (this.scenarioId == null) {
        endpoint = `/api/platformtemplates/${this.platform}/fees/${this.platformFee.id}/tier-thresholds/`;
      } else {
        endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.selectPlatformID}/platformfees/${this.platformFee.id}/tier-thresholds/`;
      };
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.tierThresholds = data.results;
      });
    },
    getTierPercs() {
      let endpoint = null
      if (this.scenarioId == null) {
        endpoint = `/api/platformtemplates/${this.platform}/fees/${this.platformFee.id}/tier-percs/`;
      } else {
        endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.selectPlatformID}/platformfees/${this.platformFee.id}/tier-percs/`;
      };
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.tierPercs = data.results;
      });
    },
    setLowerThreshold(event, index) {
      this.tierThresholds[index].lower_threshold = event;
      if (index > 0) {
        this.tierThresholds[index-1].threshold = event;
      }
    },
    setThreshold(event, index) {
      this.tierThresholds[index].threshold = event;
      if (index < this.tierThresholds.length -1) {
        this.tierThresholds[index+1].lower_threshold = event;
      }
    },
    addNewTier(){
      this.newThreshold.platform_fee_group = this.platformFee.id;
      this.tierThresholds.push({...this.newThreshold});
      this.newThreshold.lower_threshold = 0;
      this.newThreshold.threshold = 0;
      this.newPercentage.platform_fee_group = this.platformFee.id;
      let percDivide = this.newPercentage.percentage / 100;
      this.newPercentage.percentage = percDivide;
      this.tierPercs.push({...this.newPercentage});
      this.newPercentage.percentage = 0;
    },
    setPercentage(event, index) {
      this.tierPercs[index].percentage = event / 100;
    },
    getPercentage(index) {
      return this.tierPercs[index].percentage*100
    },
    selectMethod(item) {
      if (item.id) {
        return "PATCH"
      } else {
        return "POST"
      };
    },
    thresholdOrPerc(item) {
      if (item.threshold) {
        return "tier-thresholds"
      } else {
        return "tier-percs"
      }
    },
    endpointSelector(item){
      let subRoute = this.thresholdOrPerc(item);
      if (this.scenarioId == null) {
        if (item.id) {
          return `/api/platformtemplates/${this.platform}/fees/${this.platformFee.id}/${subRoute}/${item.id}/`;
        } else {
          return `/api/platformtemplates/${this.platform}/fees/${this.platformFee.id}/${subRoute}/`;
        }
      } else {
        if (item.id) {
          return `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.selectPlatformID}/platformfees/${this.platformFee.id}/${subRoute}/${item.id}/`;
        } else {
          return `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.selectPlatformID}/platformfees/${this.platformFee.id}/${subRoute}/`;
        }
      };
    },
    onSubmit() {
      for (let i=0; i < this.tierThresholds.length; i++) {
        let endpoint = this.endpointSelector(this.tierThresholds[i]);
        apiService(endpoint, this.selectMethod(this.tierThresholds[i]),
          this.tierThresholds[i]
        ).then(data => {
          this.tierThresholds[i].id = data.id
        })
      };
      for (let i=0; i < this.tierPercs.length; i++) {
        let endpoint = this.endpointSelector(this.tierPercs[i]);
        apiService(endpoint, this.selectMethod(this.tierPercs[i]),
          this.tierPercs[i]
        ).then(data => {
          this.tierPercs[i].id = data.id
        })
      };
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getTierPercs();
    this.getTierThresholds();
  }
}
</script>
